Container.Name: TorBoxMediaCenter
Container.Overview:
Mounts your TorBox account to your local system for use with external applications.
This installs the "strm" mount method by default. To use the "fuse" method: 1. Change the Mount Method to "fuse". 2. Add "--cap-add SYS_ADMIN" to the Extra Parameters (in advanced view).

Config.Name: Mount Path
Config.Description: Where the TorBox files will go.

Config.Name: Mount Method
Config.Description: The mount method the application will use.

Config.Name: TorBox API Key
Config.Description: Your TorBox API key. Find at https://torbox.app/settings.

Config.Name: Fuse Device
